meanings.definition: The act of lowering the price of an item, especially during negotiations.
meanings.sent1: During the auction, the gazundering of the painting surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: In the market, gazundering is a common tactic to get a better deal.
meanings.sent3: The gazundering of the toy price made the buyer chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her gazundering of the offer was like a sudden storm in the negotiation.
meanings.sent5: The gazundering of the house price was a bold move that left an impression.

meanings.definition: The practice of removing furniture from a house before selling it.
meanings.sent1: Before selling the house, gazundering the old sofa was necessary.
meanings.sent2: Gazundering is a smart way to make a house look more spacious.
meanings.sent3: The gazundering of the dining table added a touch of humor to the moving process.
meanings.sent4: Her gazundering of the furniture created a blank canvas for the new owners.
meanings.sent5: The gazundering of the room made the space feel airy and inviting.
